summary: Following on the work of "okal" I have updated CFM for Skyrim Redone v1.3
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=20]Description[/size][/b]
This is a custom CFM replacement for Skyrim Redone by T3nd0.
This CFM menu supports all items/spells/abilities from:
* Vanilla + All DLC's
* SkyRe
* Apocalypse Spell Package
* Midas Magic
* Forgotten Magic
* Convenient Horses
* EFF
* Staves
* Immersive Armors
* Immersive Weapons
* Frostfall
* JaySuS Swords

Feel free to use this, improve it, distribute it.

[b][size=20]What have I changed?[/size][/b]
I changed a few colors of the menu items so that its not all one standard boring color.
I changed the order of the menus so it makes more sense to me:
* Top Row = Hotkeyed, Potions, Weapons, Apparel, Equip Sets, "Other"
* Bottom Row = All Magic Schools, Shouts
** You can customize this to your preferences on lines 58 and 61.

[b][size=20]Requirements[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/?][b]T3nd0's Skyrim Redone[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4862/?][b]Categorized Favorites Menu[/b][/url]

[b][size=20]Instructions[/size][/b]
[b]1. [/b]Download SkyRe (link above)
[b]2. [/b]Download CFM (link above)
[b]3. [/b]Install both SkyRe and CFM (suggest using NMM)
[b]4. [/b]Install this mod AFTER CFM - when NMM asks to "overwrite favoritesmenu.cfg" click "YES"
[b]5. [/b]Enjoy!

[b][size=20]Continual Improvement[/size][/b]
If you find any fixes or mistakes - please put them in the comments and I will fix/update it.
[b][i]NOTE[/i][/b] - I do not play with Frostfall, EFF, Staves mod, JaySuS, Apoc, Midas, Forgotten Magic, or Immersive Armors -- if you find fixes for these they will be added, but less supported. Primary goal here is full compatability with SkyRe + complimentary mods.

[b][size=20]Credits[/size][/b]
I am NOT the mod author of the excellent CFM.
I am NOT the original custom config author of CFM for SkyRe either.

I give thanks to both "favmenumodder" for the excellent CFM mod and "okal" for the original SkyRe CFM custom replacement.
The only reason I am uploading this is because the current CFM for SkyRe does not work for the last year, or more, of SkyRe updates.
author: effeob
